owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

paused().details: Returns true if the contract is paused, and false otherwise.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

supportsInterface(bytes4).details: The following 3 functions are required to ERC1155 standard

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

_usersToArtifacts.details: Mapping showing the amount of artifacts a user would win in specific mining session

_usersToResources.details: Mapping showing the amount of resources a user would win in specific mining session

MiningEnded(address,(uint32,bool,bool,ui.notice: Indicates that mining session has ended

MiningStarted(address,(uint32,bool,bool,.notice: Indicates that new mining session has started

RewardsClaimed(address,uint256[],uint256.notice: Indicates that user has claimed his rewards
